text:
Hie All,
Is that possible to render : <https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/authorize?client_id=abccd&redirect_uri=xyz.com&scope=oauth> in iframe ?
I’m facing this issue :  Refused to frame ‘<https://app.HubSpot.com/>’ because an ancestor violates the following Content Security Policy directive: “frame-ancestors ‘self’ <http://app.HubSpot.com|app.HubSpot.com>”.
Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:

Loading an iframe of an oauth login is big time shady and even warned of by the OAuth2 Spec (<https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749#section-10.13>). You should 100% avoid doing this, as this is most probably prevented for good.

Hello <@U014A8JD9DH> - thanks for answer I am facing same issue likely I little confused on that how other CMS plugin like wordpress HubSpot plugin giving option to directly login from wordpress backend interface. I just want to have login screen in our backend environment.
